page.title: 08BOLNEY C.E. PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
STAFF Headmistress, 1: Infant Teacher 1: 5/10 Junior Teacher, 1: 2/10 Remedialteacher, 1: Ancilliary helper, 1:caretaker, 1: Cook, 1: Assistant cook, 1
BUILDINGS 3 large classrooms: office: kitchen cloakroom: girl's toilets: boy's toilets: staff toilet.
OUTSIDE Playground: Patio with flower beds: back garden with climbing frame and conservation area: swimming pool (unheated). Glebe field is used for sports.
THE BUILDING is very attractive, built of local green sandstone like the Church with pleasant patterned red roof tiles.
